name: Cloud Game (Sammenspiel, uniquespirit889)
description:
Be a little cloud and rain on your friends, but sooner or later we all run outta water!

Programming by Sammenspiel
Art by uniquespirit889

Created in under 72 hours for the 101st Mini Jam
